Bill Clinton promises that if anything happens to Hillary he will gladly step in as president: âItâll be Bill Clinton two, bigger and blacker.â

While Hillaryâs presidential campaign has been widely accepted as a given for years, she is now expected to formally announce on Sunday. The announcement is expected to come in the form of a video posted to social media, The New York Times reported.
description:
Kate McKinnon’s Clinton spent Saturday’s SNL cold open trying to seem relatable and avoiding words like “dynasty.”











 
 
	

	 	  View Video ›
	  
	


 buzzfeed-video1.s3.amazonaws.com














 In the sketch, Clinton warms up for her social media announcement. 

"Hillary's a granny with a twinkle in her eye," she recites, later adding "First female president, first female president. Me me me me me me me."


 














 

 
	

   
 
	


 NBC

title: "SNL" Pokes Fun At Hillary Clinton On The Eve Of Her Presidential Campaign
